adrFormatAddress: 2121 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I have been taking online capoeira classes with Mestre Alegria for the past year. Even in an online setting, Mestre Alegria makes sure I am included in the group and that I am understanding the movements. When I am in person the energy here is always great and the group members are very friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend you try out a class! All levels are welcome!

text.text: I have been taking online capoeira classes with Mestre Alegria for the past year. When I am in person the energy here is always great and the group members are very friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend you try out a class! All levels are welcome!

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of being a part of Capoeira Arts and Dance NY for several months, and I can confidently say that it is an exceptional capoeira studio. The welcoming community, combined with the outstanding teaching artists, creates an environment where everyone feels included and inspired to learn.

The sense of community at Capoeira Arts and Dance NY is truly remarkable. From the moment you step through the doors, you are greeted with warmth and enthusiasm by fellow students and instructors alike. It's clear that inclusivity and respect are deeply valued within this community. Regardless of age or ability, everyone is encouraged and supported in their capoeira journey.

The teaching artists, Mestre Alegria and Mestra Janete Da Silva are second to none. Their dedication to Afro-Brazilian art forms shines through in every class. They possess a wealth of knowledge, skill, and passion that they effortlessly transmit to their students. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced practitioner, the instructors tailor their instruction to suit your individual needs, ensuring that you receive the guidance necessary to progress and excel.

What sets Capoeira Arts and Dance NY apart is the diversity of classes they offer. From kids' classes to adult programs, there is something for everyone. The classes are thoughtfully designed to accommodate various skill levels, allowing individuals to grow at their own pace. The instructors create a positive and supportive atmosphere that fosters both physical and mental development.

Not only are the classes physically engaging and energizing, but they also delve into the rich cultural and historical aspects of capoeira. This holistic approach adds depth to the training experience and enhances one's understanding of the art form.

Overall, Capoeira Arts and Dance NY is a gem within the capoeira community. The welcoming nature of the community and the exceptional teaching artists make it a truly special place. Regardless of age or ability, you will find yourself embraced by a supportive and inspiring group of individuals. I highly recommend Capoeira Arts and Dance NY to anyone seeking outstanding capoeira classes that cater to all ages and abilities.

Thank you, Capoeira Arts and Dance NY, for creating such an incredible space for capoeira training and community-building!

originalText.text: Mestre Alegria and Instrutora Aide are phenomenal!! Between guided movements, learning the music, and the rich cultural history of capoeira, no stone is left unturned. Very thorough learning experience, highly recommended.

originalText.text:
The most welcoming energy with dedication to real growth and sharing of knowledge. Beautiful movements with thoughtful strategies this class is th future of capoeira
Mestre Alegria is creating a community and a movement

originalText.text: A truly amazing class for all levels. Challenging, it meets you exactly where you are and pushes you just that little bit more. Mestre Alegría runs and warm and welcoming and light hearted studio. You'll make friends. You'll move better. See you there! :-)

text.text: A truly amazing class for all levels. Challenging, it meets you exactly where you are and pushes you just that little bit more. Mestre Alegría runs and warm and welcoming and light hearted studio. You'll make friends. You'll move better. See you there! :-)
